subject: Re: [junit] Having problem with Test Suite - Will you please help me
msgSnippet: Having AllTests extend from TestCase is not necessary. It works but it doesn t help in any way. That s why you shouldn t do it. Johannes ... -- +++ GMX - Mail,
messageBody:
Having AllTests extend from TestCase is not necessary. It works but it
doesn't help in any way. That's why you shouldn't do it.

Johannes

> I agree with you point 2 and 3. But not on point 1:>
> 1. Your suite class should not extend TestCase
> >
> I have fixed the code already and running smoothly.
> Thanks for your reply.
> --- Jeff Nielsen <jeff.nielsen@...>
> wrote:
> > 1. Your suite class should not extend TestCase
> >
> > 2. The signature of the suite method should be
> > "public static Test suite()"
> > with a lower-case "s".
> >
> > 3. Your main method should call
> > junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite())

--
